scripts.start: pnpm start:main & pnpm start:react & pnpm start:vue
scripts.start:react: pnpm --filter react-app start & pnpm --filter react-vite-app start & pnpm --filter react-webpack-app start
scripts.start:vue: pnpm --filter vue-app start & pnpm --filter vue-vite-app start & pnpm --filter vue-webpack-app start
